itemDisplayName: Create an Azure Cosmos account for with mixed throughput
description: This template creates an Azure Cosmos account for Core (SQL) API in two regions with 2 containers that share throughput set at the database-level and one container that has dedicated throughput.
summary: Creates an Azure Cosmos DB account for Core (SQL) API in two regions with 2 containers that share throughput set at the database-level and one container that has dedicated throughput.
